title: cyber criminals
extract: Cybercrime, or computer-oriented crime, is the crime that involves a computer and a network.The computer may have been used in the commission of a crime, or it may be the target.Cybercrimes can be defined as: "Offences that are committed against individuals or groups of individuals with a criminal motive to ...
